text:
Cambridge, UK

Web developer at http://AllYearbooks.co.uk

We're looking for one or two talented full-stack developers to help us build our Node.js single-page collaborative, real-time web-app for creating real, hard-copy printed yearbooks.

You'll be using: Node.js, CoffeeScript, HTML5 canvas, Backbone.js, jQuery, Ubuntu servers, Redis, PostgreSQL etc.

More at: http://allyearbooks.co.uk/jobs/dev (including a fun little code test!)
